alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Delaware and north central Sullivan Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Margaretville, or 16 miles southeast of Delhi, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parksville, Hazel, Livingston Manor, Willowemoc, Roscoe, Dunraven, Shandelee, Waneta Lake, Anderson and Little Pond Campground. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 94 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
